name: Living Program
description:
Living Program

What if a computer doing self defending? become a strange walking thing? no, it's not a computer, your office had a project testing a repaired robot but someone trying to put a virus then it become a wild machine.

Approach, run, survive, keep your distance and follow the instruction from the message, the only way you can survive 

Living Program is a short survival 'horror'(?) game where you need to gathering all the project data then make it a new AI behaviour to stop the wild machine.

CONTROL

  • Walk - WASD
  • Run - WASD + Left Shift
  • Jump - Space
  • Crouch - Ctrl
  • Do an action - Left Mouse Click
  • Use Item - Right Mouse Click
  • Inventory - E
  • Manage Chat - TAB
